paragraphs.text:
%md
###00-PreFlight Check
#### To check the Zeppelin Install
### Steps
1. Compile zeppelin 
    * mvn clean package -DskipTests -Pspark-1.6 -Phadoop-2.6 -Ppyspark
2. Configure (if needed)
    * ./conf/zeppelin-env.sh
    * ./conf/zeppelin-site.xml
3. Run the Zeppelin daemon
    * ./bin/zeppelin-daemon.sh start|stop|status|restart
    * ~/Downloads/zeppelin-0.5.6-incubating/bin/zeppelin-daemon.sh start
4. cd to the directory where you have downloaded the Tutorial data
    * cd /Volumes/sdxc-01/Strata-2016/
5. Run IDE in browser
    * localhost:8080

result.msg:
00-PreFlight Check

To check the Zeppelin Install

Steps

  1. Compile zeppelin
    • mvn clean package -DskipTests -Pspark-1.6 -Phadoop-2.6 -Ppyspark
  2. Configure (if needed)
    • ./conf/zeppelin-env.sh
    • ./conf/zeppelin-site.xml
  3. Run the Zeppelin daemon
    • ./bin/zeppelin-daemon.sh start|stop|status|restart
    • ~/Downloads/zeppelin-0.5.6-incubating/bin/zeppelin-daemon.sh start
  4. cd to the directory where you have downloaded the Tutorial data
    • cd /Volumes/sdxc-01/Strata-2016/
  5. Run IDE in browser
    • localhost:8080
